attributes.action: Take a Break's Drop the Age Campaign
attributes.additional_details:
We believe that 25 is too late to start the screening programme. Lowering the age would save the lives, health and fertility of countless young women.
Our views are backed by our readers and leading health professionals.
No more daughters, sisters or young mothers should die needlessly from cervical cancer. Please sign our petition add your voice to our campaign.

Thank you.

rejection.details: Please see: Lower the Cervical Screening age.
